title: The Carrollton Plot
description: In this Dateline classic, Frank Howard, a high flying accountant from Carrollton, Texas, learns that his wife has been brutally attacked in their home while he’s away on business in California. Andrea Canning reports. Originally aired on NBC on October 17, 2014.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
